CustomField.formula: IF( OR( PNG_Latitude__c = 0 , PNG_Longitude__c = 0 ) , "Missing Coordinates", HYPERLINK("https://www.google.com/maps/place/"& TEXT(PNG_Latitude__c )&"+"& TEXT(PNG_Longitude__c)&"/@"& TEXT(PNG_Latitude__c)&","& TEXT(PNG_Longitude__c)&",350m/data=!3m1!1e3!", "View Coordinates in Google Map"))
CustomField.label: Map Link
